attributes.action: Make retail essentials work places a priority for COVID 19 vacation
attributes.additional_details: As I’m classed as a key worker but work for a retail store. Myself and all other workers are not classed as a high importance to have the COVID 19 vacation, yet we are susceptible to catching the virus as majority of us work 5 days a week for people to be able to have a weekly food shop. Therefore we are at risk of catching the virus.
attributes.background: To be able to provide vacation to retail essential shop workers who have had to work continuously throughout the pandemic

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Prioritise Key Retail Workers, being offered the Covid Vaccine!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426
